text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Wednesday’s episode, Gaurang Shah, head market strategist at Geojit Financial Services and Sameet Chavan, chief analyst - technical and derivatives at Angel Broking gave their views on BHEL, GIC, HPL Electric, Jyothi Labs and many more.
title: #AskBQ: How To Play BHEL, GIC, HPL Electric, Jyothi Labs?
